name: DUM (Rhomita)
description:
DUM, just another Fan-made Doom "game" using Unreal Engine.

This is a video explaining how I made it (it is in spanish but it has english subs)


It's NOT a complete game, It ONLY contains the first level because it was made by hand (without using the WADs of the game) and it was made just for learning purposes (I will not continue working on this). It's 100% free, and it uses the sprites and sounds of the original game so you can feel the escence of the classic Doom. It also contains an Infinite Level where you can kill monsters indefinitely.

Yes, it's only one level, but I tried to add every possible detail so it looks exactly the same, I also tried to make the gameplay fun. So please, give me feedback so I can improve in the future!

Controls:

  • AWSD to move
  • 'Shift' to run
  • '3' to equip the Shotgun
  • '5' to equip the Rocket Launcher
  • 'e' to open doors/secrets
  • 'space' jump (yes, you can, but you shouldn't!)
  • 'u' to hide the UI
  • 'p' or 'ESC' to pause and open the Menu (you can change the Mouse Sensitivity)
  • 't' to restart. (because sometimes we press 'r' to reload (no, you cannot reload, it's like doom))

If you want, you can do IDDQD and IDKFA, but you shouldn't! :D

This game is a demonstration of the appreciation I have for a game I played a lot in my childhood, BUT if you are from ID Software and don't agree with me using the sprites and sounds, contact me and I will remove the game.
